snippet.title: SEGASonic Bros. Direct Capture Footage
snippet.description:
So... this is out there now.

This game is actually quite a lot of fun! It's very different because you're not trying to match colors, rather you're attempting to make lines that connect to the sides or form some kind of loop. Still trying to work out combos, and as you can see, I start to get the hang of it a little bit more by the end.

MAJOR thanks to GerbilSoft for compiling the version of MAME that supports this thing. Cheers bro!

Neo Reviews will return... probably after the first of the year. I'm still shocked I could do this, cause this laptop is pining for death.

tweetz: http://twitter.com/NeoHazard
